    • Method Detail

      • submit

        @RequestMapping(method=GET)
public java.lang.String submit(org.springframework.ui.Model model)

      • submit

        @RequestMapping(method=POST)
public java.lang.String submit(@RequestParam(value="file")
                                                             org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file,
                                                             @ModelAttribute(value="userDTO")
                                                             UserDTO userDTO,
                                                             org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Get the file from the POST request and save it to the /resources/upload/ path within the server.
        Parameters:
        file - the file submitted in the POST request.
        userDTO - this is a UserDTO that the /upload form is sending through a POST method.
        modelMap - to add an attribute to the next html page.
        Returns:
        the next html page.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
